schema.description: Gets all of the auction infos for a given token address.
schema.title: Auction infos for address

ui:options.title: Auction Infos for Address
ui:options.description: Retrieve detailed information for auctions associated with a given token address.

ui:options.title: Token Address
ui:options.description: The blockchain address of the token to retrieve auction information for.

ui:options.title: Result Limit
ui:options.description: (Optional) Maximum number of auction info entries to retrieve.

ui:options.title: Start After
ui:options.description: (Optional) Auction ID after which to start listing auction info.
